TopicTitle: Can someone help me get a few mods?

Articles.Content:
I'm looking to get Farlo Planetary Pack and Arkas, both are downloaded from a broken site. Apparently it's broken right now and it has been for a while so I was wondering if anyone with these mods would be able to upload them to another filesharing site so I can get them.

EDIT: Oh yeah, I was also looking into getting KerbolPlus too.

Yeah, the mod hosting site has been having some issues this weekend, dunno what's going on but I hope it's not a sign of imminent collapse.  I seem to recall reading somewhere that it's being run on a shoestring by one guy with a server, so it may be vulnerable.

Arkas is a nice mod, I've played around with it quite a bit, definitely worth getting into.

If you're looking for planet packs, my top recommendations are:

Outer Planets adds new planets to the outer solar system (equivalents of Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto), without disturbing any of the inner system (other than moving Eeloo to become a moon of the Saturn-equivalent).

New Horizons completely reshuffles the solar system (for example, Kerbin becomes a moon of a gas giant), and adds lots of new planets and moons.

Both very well done, and neither requires the former mod hosting site to download.

On 2/14/2016 at 6:42 PM, Snark said:

Yeah, the mod hosting site has been having some issues this weekend, dunno what's going on but I hope it's not a sign of imminent collapse.  I seem to recall reading somewhere that it's being run on a shoestring by one guy with a server, so it may be vulnerable.

Arkas is a nice mod, I've played around with it quite a bit, definitely worth getting into.

If you're looking for planet packs, my top recommendations are:

Outer Planets adds new planets to the outer solar system (equivalents of Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto), without disturbing any of the inner system (other than moving Eeloo to become a moon of the Saturn-equivalent).

New Horizons completely reshuffles the solar system (for example, Kerbin becomes a moon of a gas giant), and adds lots of new planets and moons.

Both very well done.  Also, neither one requires the former mod hosting site to download. 

Thanks, I'll check out New Horizons, although I tried OPM and I think it was causing KSP to crash.

6 minutes ago, Clockwork13 said:

Thanks, I'll check out New Horizons, although I tried OPM and I think it was causing KSP to crash.

Really?  What version of OPM?  I just did a complete OPM career play-through and had no trouble with it at all.

Just now, Snark said:

Really?  What version of OPM?  I just did a complete OPM career play-through and had no trouble with it at all.

Not sure what the version was, but I think it was an incompatibility with one of my other planet mods. Although I may try it again since I got rid of all of the previous mods that could have been interfering with it.
Modding question moved to the modding subforum.

Farlo and Arkas

You can find every mod hosted on kerbalstuff at that site.
